resources:
Scarlet Serenity Log in ! Start ! erreur No pseudo Who are you? Or rather who were you? Are you a woman or a man? Validate You need to write your pseudo You have to write your pseudo and select your gender Your character is created ! Hi ! Your character is here Create your character now Good! You will have to answer a series of questions so that I can get to know you a little more Let\'s go What\'s your principal goal in your life? Become the strongest Know all of the word Live with my instinct Wait for the best opportunities What form do you prefer? Square Triangle Round Star You find yourself in front of the enemy general protected by 100 men Attack without thinking You explode the barrels of powder You sneak up to kill the chef In your free time you like You walk on a trap that kills others Play sports Studying Climb trees Play at the casino Fan of famous game Danganronpa you would be The Ultimate Lucky Makoto Naegi The Ultimate Martial Artist Sakura Ôgami The Ultimate Detective Kyôko Kirigiri The Ultimate Assassin Maki Harukawa You wake up 3000 years after the world turned to stone. Who do you want to release first? A strong and enduring person A renowned scientist A person who can sneak around A random person An argument breaks out between your two best friends You separate them with strength and conviction You conduct an investigation to find out who is right You take one of your friends discreetly without the other noticing You wait for a shooting star to forget your friends\' dispute The object that most suits you Sword Magic wand Shuriken Four leaf clovers In an rpg game your class would be Warrior Magician The animal that most characterizes you Thief Gentleman Luck Lion Owl Cat Rabbit You are a strong person ! With such strength nothing will stop you! You deserve even more power! (+20 in strength) End You are an intelligent person ! Your knowledge can help people and you can discover great spells ! (+20 in intelligence) You are an agile person ! Fast and cunning you will be able to dodge and attack the enemy without him being able to notice it ! (+20 in agility) You are a lucky person ! Luck is on your side, a guardian angel protects you and bless you in this life ! (+20 in luck) You are a versatile person ! Complete, you are the ideal person to perfect all your senses in this world! (+7 in all) Game fan mmorpg you unfortunately died in an accident. But before dying, the goddess of another world Kione needs valiant souls to save her world. Indeed, the war in the world of Selena has resulted in many deaths. They were invaded by bloodthirsty monsters. You can if you want to go to paradise by uninstalling the game but you can always come back when you want. Understood Strength Intelligence Agility Luck Health Mana
